title: Tuzi Nali Pao
sinopse: The naughty rabbit and puppy urinated on the head of the animator Li Zhiyong, only to get caught. The painter decided to punish these two guys. The puppy was helplessly beaten, but how could the lively little rabbit easily give in? It and the painter had a wonderful and exciting offensive and defensive battle in the Fangcundou room. Who is going to die in the end?(translated from douban)
